meanings.definition: To coat or treat with platinum.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler was platinizing the ring to give it a shiny finish.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys platinizing jewelry to enhance its appearance.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled the platinum solution while platinizing the necklace.
meanings.sent4: The sun was platinizing the ocean with its golden rays at sunset.
meanings.sent5: Platinizing the car parts made them more resistant to corrosion.

meanings.sent1: The scientist was platinizing the metal to study its properties.
meanings.sent2: They were platinizing the ore to extract pure platinum.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand unexpectedly turned the coin into platinizing material.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to platinize the room, brightening everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: The alchemist's goal was to platinize base metals into precious platinum.

meanings.sent1: The platinizing of the statue was a meticulous process.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of platinizing through years of practice.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best platinizing in town was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for platinizing was evident in every piece she worked on.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased the history of platinizing in various cultures.
